name: 3Souls
description:
Discover the world of Mustland with Nelesa, Nophes and Nidemon in the sad cells of Moon Prison, the colorful streets of Sleepless City and the drab walls of Paperthin Farm with 3Souls. In this 2D puzzle-platformer, players must utilise the unique features of the Wii U™ GamePad to solve puzzles and the touch screen to glimpse into the thoughts and feelings residing within the character's soul.

A second player can join in on the journey to help you with the platformer parts of the game in local Co-Op Mode.
